participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, Alex values love and family.
participant_1.background: I'm a working musician who is passionate about my dogs. I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that I'm proud of who I am and who I love. I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday. My favorite book is Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice. I am not a morning person, but I do love my parents and sweets.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Caring and dedicated, Emily thrives on family time and healthy living.
participant_2.background: I am proud of my daughter. I wake up early to feed my cats and then work on my laptops until it's time to get ready for my wedding in the park. I love fresh seafood and vegetables from the Pacific Northwest. I am trying to keep myself fit and healthy. My biggest fear is not being able to overcome my eating disorder and being stuck in this cycle forever.

content.text: My favorite book is Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen! What about you?
Same! It's so well written and funny. I'm a working musician and I'm passionate about my dogs. What do you do for work?
I'm a stay-at-home mom and I love it! I get to spend all day with my daughter and I love cooking healthy meals for her.
That's awesome! I love cooking too. What are your favorite foods to make?
I love making fresh seafood and vegetables from the Pacific Northwest. I'm trying to keep myself fit and healthy.
That sounds delicious! I'm not much of a morning person, but I do love my parents and sweets.
I'm not a morning person either! I usually wake up early to feed my cats and then work on my laptops until it's time to get ready for my day.
That sounds like a busy schedule! I'm glad you have time for your daughter and your pets.
Thanks! I'm lucky to have such a great family.
